## GetProductsOptions.activeOnly property

Set to `true` to retrieve only the currently active set of Stripe products. If not set, returns all available products. When set, the effect is same as if called with the filter `["active", "==", true]`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
activeOnly?: boolean;
```
